description: The cuisine at this tiny, simply furnished restaurant includes barbecued dishes and fermented ingredients, all of which feature on a tasting menu. Guests can also choose à la carte: the small portions (as the restaurant name suggests) make it possible to taste several dishes at a reasonable cost. Booking is essential in the evening and also advisable at lunchtime.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
